nodes.text: Rodian Rations were light yet alcoholic snacks served at Oga's Cantina in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu in 34 ABY. A Rodian Ration was safe for humans to consume. It shared its name with the Rodian species.

The Rodian Ration snack is sold as a "provision with alcohol" at Oga's Cantina bar in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge. It was first revealed as part of a large promotional event held on February 26, 2019, but rather than appearing at the Disneyland Galaxy's Edge when it opened on May 31, it debuted at the Disney's Hollywood Studios opening on August 29 as an exclusive to that park. Prior to the opening, the Disney Parks Blog described Oga's Obsession as a non-alcoholic version of the Rodian Ration. The menu description is, "Tito's Handmade Vodka, Dekuyper Pucker Sour Apple, green apple, Sprite®, and boba balls with a pop."
